10 DIM PT$(166):PT$="":FOR I=1 TO 166:READ A:S=S+A:PT$(I)=CHR$(A):NEXT I
20 IF S<>22969 THEN ? CHR$(125);CHR$(29);CHR$(127);"BLAD W DANYCH !";CHR$(253):END 
30 ? CHR$(125);CHR$(29):FOR I=70 TO 130 STEP 10:? I:NEXT I:? "CONT":POSITION 2,0:POKE 842,13:STOP 
40 POKE 842,12:? CHR$(125);CHR$(29):POKE 766,1:? "10DIMPT$(166),T$(255):PT$=";CHR$(34);PT$(1,75);CHR$(34)
50 ? "20PT$(76)=";CHR$(34);PT$(76);CHR$(34):POKE 766,0:FOR I=30 TO 60 STEP 10:? I:NEXT I
60 ? "POKE842,12:L.":POSITION 2,0:POKE 842,13:STOP 
70 DATA 104,201,4,240,9,170,240,5,104,104,202,208,251,96,104,133,206,104,133,205,104,104,168,104
